EmailTemplate.description: Se utiliza en el proceso de invoices
EmailTemplate.name: Pre book approval Process
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} submited for approval in AB
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User You are receiving this notification because the {!Units__c.Name} from #FleetToGo {!FleetToGo__c.Name} for customer {!Units__c.Customer_Name__c} has been booked:
Requestor: {!Units__c.LastModifiedBy} Fleet Name: {!FleetToGo__c.Fleet_Name__c}
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here.
Regards,
Digital Marketing
